Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.subtitle: Your all-in-one solution for modern farming. What would you like to do today?

descriptions.price-prediction: Get AI-powered price forecasts for your crops.
descriptions.disease-diagnosis: Upload a photo to diagnose crop diseases instantly.
descriptions.crop-recommendation: Find the best crops to grow based on your location and weather.
descriptions.weather-prediction: Get forecasts and actionable farming tips for your location.
descriptions.marketplace: Buy and sell agricultural products directly.
descriptions.community: Connect with fellow farmers and share knowledge.

Welcome.tagline: Get AI-powered crop insights, connect with a community of farmers, and trade on our exclusive marketplace.

Auth.login-subtitle: Enter your email below to login to your account
Auth.signup-subtitle: Enter your information to join the Farmingo community

Marketplace.title: Marketplace
Marketplace.subtitle: Buy and sell fresh produce and farming supplies directly.
Marketplace.no-products-verified: There are currently no products listed from verified sellers.
Marketplace.no-products-indirect: There are currently no items listed here. Be the first to post something for sale!
Marketplace.verified-seller-alert: Only users with a verified seller account can list products in this marketplace. Verification is handled by administrators.

Community.title: Community Hub
Community.subtitle: Connect with fellow farmers, share knowledge, and grow together. Explore a community or search for content below.
Community.no-posts-community: No posts in this community yet.
Community.be-the-first: Be the first to share something!

price-prediction.title: Crop Price Prediction
price-prediction.subtitle: Predict the price of a crop based on region and date using our AI-powered model.
price-prediction.awaiting-desc: Your price prediction will appear here.
price-prediction.analyzing: Our AI is analyzing market data. Please wait a moment.

disease-diagnosis.title: Crop Disease Diagnosis
disease-diagnosis.subtitle: Upload an image to predict the disease of a crop using our AI-powered model.
disease-diagnosis.upload-desc: For best results, use a clear photo of the affected area.
disease-diagnosis.analyzing-desc: Our AI is analyzing your image.
disease-diagnosis.awaiting-desc: Your diagnosis report will appear here.

weather.title: Weather & Advice
weather.subtitle: Get forecasts and actionable farming tips for your location.

crop-recommendation.title: Crop Recommendation
crop-recommendation.subtitle: Get crop recommendations based on your location and local weather data from our AI-powered model.
crop-recommendation.get-desc: Use your current location to get a crop recommendation based on live weather data.
crop-recommendation.fetching: Fetching your location and weather data...

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.no-posts-desc: When you post, they'll show up here.
Profile.user-not-found-desc: The user u/{username} does not exist.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings, profile, and preferences.
Settings.profile-desc: This is how others will see you on the site.
Settings.account-desc: Manage your account security and identification.
Settings.appearance-desc: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
Settings.translation-desc: Choose your preferred language and manage automatic translation settings.
Settings.orders-desc: View your order history and track the status of your purchases.
Settings.theme-desc: Select the theme for the application.
Settings.language-desc: This language will be used as the primary target for the "Translate" feature.
Settings.email-no-change: Your email address is {email}. This cannot be changed.
Settings.mentions-desc: When someone mentions you in a post or comment.
Settings.new-messages-desc: When you receive a new direct message.
Settings.product-updates-desc: News, updates, and marketing from Farmingo.
Settings.push-desc: Choose which push notifications you want to receive on your devices.
Settings.auto-translate-desc: Choose which types of content should be automatically translated to your default language.
Settings.community-posts-desc: Automatically translate titles and content of community posts.
Settings.market-posts-desc: Translate item names and descriptions in the indirect market.

Cart.title: Shopping Cart
Cart.empty-desc: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet.
Cart.review-items: Review your items before checking out.

OrderPlaced.title: Order Placed!
OrderPlaced.subtitle: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been successfully submitted.
OrderPlaced.desc: You will receive a confirmation email shortly. This is a demo app, so no real order has been processed.
